name: faq
title: Explore Trades & Apprenticeships in Marion County Today
description: Elevate for Humanity Career and Technical Institute offers workforce training, apprenticeships, and WIO funding in Marion County, IN to boost career prospects.

sections.text: Elevate for Humanity Career and Technical Institute

sections.content: Frequently asked questionsWhat types of apprenticeships does Elevate for Humanity offer?
We offer apprenticeships in various technical fields, including electrical, plumbing, and IT, tailored to industry needs and standards.How can I apply for a training program?
You can apply online through our website or visit us at our Marion County location for assistance.Are there any eligibility requirements for the programs?
Yes, applicants must meet specific age, educational, and residency criteria. Details are available on our website or by contacting us.What funding options are available for participants?
We provide scholarship opportunities, government grants, and payment plans to ensure affordability for all eligible participants.How long do the apprenticeship programs typically last?
